p: In an experimental study of vertical ZIKV infection, a total of 69 pools of Ae. aegypti adult mosquitos (F1) were tested, and six were positive in an indirect immunofluorescent antibody assay [ 32]. While other studies have demonstrated the natural vertical transmission of DENV [ 11, 33â€“ 37], the detection of ZIKV in naturally infected larvae had not yet been described.
